name: In:Triangle Assault
description:
Survive hordes of enemies in this action plataformer with some roguelite aspects!

Collect coins to upgrade your weapon between waves, after you die you can use the soul of your enemies to buy a set of unique bullets for your weapon.

Made in 20 Days for the Metafab gamejam, you can get your wallet address in the shop, then put it on the wallet address field in this site, after that, you can try buying some coins using the buy more button :)

You can learn more about MetaFab here

Known issues:
I forgot to make a pause button, but you can still pause with alt+tab💀
The Matic counter in the menu is not formatted, decimals are getting messy.
I did not put a minimum number of letters in the login, so it is possible to login with an empty username and password '-' (not recommended)
I KNOW the menu is ugly xd

Controls:

WASD - MOVE
SPACE - JUMP
MOUSE - AIM
LEFT MOUSE BUTTON - SHOOT
R - RESTART
ALT+TAB - PAUSE💀

Credits:

Everything was made by ME
Except for the music which was made by: Tallbeard
